## 拿到過去的國家代碼
```{R}
get_OldCode=function(Country,NOC){
    #Country=read.csv("CountryCode.csv")
    Code=Country$Code
    return(unlist(strsplit(Country[which(Country$Code==NOC),]$OldCode," ")))
}
Country=read.csv("CountryCode.csv")
Code=Country$Code
Target_NOC="TPE"
get_OldCode(Country,Target_NOC)
```
